content.html: Wearing a mask when exposed to a carrier with no mask: upper bound risk of infection is 30% When everyone is masked: upper bound risk of infection is 0.4% Public health breaks down when one makes it about personal choice pnas.org/doi/10.1073/pn…
content.value:
Wearing a mask when exposed to a carrier with no mask: upper bound risk of infection is 30%

When everyone is masked: upper bound risk of infection is 0.4%

Public health breaks down when one makes it about personal choice
